thread.title: Chipotle Pays to Keep Two Executives Past CEO Search

author: Julie Jargon
title: Chipotle Pays to Keep Two Executives Past CEO Search
text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. is giving two of its top executives retention bonuses while the burrito maker searches for a new CEO.
Founder Steve Ells said last month that he would soon step down as chief executive. Chipotle will pay its chiefs of finance and marketing bonuses one year after a new CEO is appointed, a securities filing showed on Friday.
Enticing...
